name: Sesame Ginger Veggie Omelet
description: Make healthy, fluffy, restaurant-quality omelets with less fuss.
preparation: Whisk eggs and milk until frothy. Pour into a lightly oiled Omelet Maker.
Top eggs with vegetables and Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning.
Close lid and microwave on high for 2–3 minutes.
Loosen omelet with a spatula, flip onto a plate and serve topped with hot sauce, if desired.

products.name: Asian Stir-Fry Seasoning
summary: Your go-to for stir-fries, sautéed vegetables or add as a seasoning to any rice and noodle dish.
